CustomMetadata.label: SF2026 Profile to Permission Set Migration

values.value: Retire Standard Profiles and Move Access to Permission Sets
Treat standard profiles as templates only and shift object, field, and system access controls into permission sets and permission set groups.

Inventory all users on standard profiles and create equivalent custom profiles with minimal baseline access. Remove excess profile permissions and grant role-specific access through permission sets and permission set groups. Require documented business justification for any high-risk permission such as Modify All Data, Author Apex, API Enabled, and View All Data.
